Sushi Special

Avocado/crab

Stay healthy, eat sushi! As always sushi is fresh and keep your health better. This is simple and delicious meal. It's made of avocado, crab, cucumber and sauce. It can be for individual or group.

samon/tuna/crab

Fried onion/ spicy mayo/ eel sauce
